data.text:
Melissa Womer, formerly Melissa Carrey, is an American actress and producer. She is an ex-wife of the famous American actor and comedian Jim Carrey.

This multi-talented actress is best known for her roles in the comedy Man on the Moon. She has also acted in films; True stories for donut men. She is famous as the waitress of the comedy store.

Biography of Melissa Womer

The comedy shop waitress was born as MelissaJaine Womer on July 8, 1960 in New York, United States. She did not appreciate a stable upbringing because, according to many reports, she grew up in a dysfunctional family.

Melissa Womer attended her elementary and high school in New York and she was later enrolled at the University of Kansas. During her college years, she did excellent jobs, such as writing jokes for the morning radio show at Q104 in Kansas City.

After graduating from the University of Kansas, Melissa went to Hollywood in hopes of making a name for herself. But she was unable to achieve anything huge. She instead landed a job as a waitress at the Sunset Boulevard bar, where the comedy store is located. Later, she had the opportunity to participate in an open mic night at the Comedy store and she really enjoyed her first open mic night.

Melissa has become a favorite character in some comics at the comedy store. The comics, however, encouraged her to transfer her writing skills to the comedy store scene. During her career, she took a big step in BET’s socially offensive behavior with DL Hughley and since then she has become so driven and has never looked back.

Womer became popular for her roles in films such as Petrocelli (1974) and Man on the Moon (1999). She produced reality series including Real Donut Men Stories (1997) and The Yesterday Show with John Kerwin (2004).

Relationship between Melissa Womer and Jim Carrey

Melissa caught the attention of people in Hollywood when she met then-struggling comedian and actor Jim Carrey, who now bills himself as an acclaimed impressionist, producer, screenwriter, comedian, and actor.

Jim Carrey was born on January 17, 1962 in Newmarket, Ontario, Canada. Jim’s mother, Kathleen Carrey, was a homemaker, while his father, Percy Carrey, was a musician and also an accountant. Jim is the youngest in his family, he has three older siblings whom he loves so much; John (his brother), Patricia and Rita (Jim’s sisters).

Growing up, Jim’s family had become penniless, prompting Jim and all of his family members to work as janitors for a living.

After Melissa met Jim, they dated and later got married, making her his very first wife. When they initially met at the Comedy Store, they immediately bonded with each other. Melissa and Jim began dating in 1986. The couple married on March 28, 1987. The wedding took place at Mahi-Mahi, a hotel in Santa Monica, California.

A few months after their marriage, Melissa gave birth to a beautiful daughter named Jane Erin Carrey on September 6, 1987. Jane grew up following in her parents’ footsteps and participated as a contestant on the singing reality show ‘American Idol’ in 2012.

Melissa Woman’s Divorce

The marriage of Melissa and Jim did not last so longlong, it ended in 1995 after seven years of living together. They reportedly divorced because of their respective busy careers. Jim was the one who initiated the divorce. He reportedly divorced Melissa to be with Hollywood hottie Lauren Holly. Carrey and Holly co-star in the movie “Dumb and Dummer.”

Personal life: family and grandchildren

Melissa Womer currently lives in New York and she is still single. There is no indication that Womer has had another boyfriend or husband since the divorce from Jim Carrey. She is a shy person and likes to keep her private life away from the media.

However, Melissa became a grandmother after her, and Jane Carrey, daughter of Jim Carrey, gave birth to her son Jackson Riley Santana in 2010. Jane married Alex Santana, lead singer of metal band Blood Money, in 2009, and gave birth to her child a year later. Soon after, Jane filed for divorce from her husband citing “irreconcilable differences” and requested joint custody of her child post-divorce.

She is currently dating American comedian John Campanelli.
